Tolkien-related events that took place in 1901.

content.title: October
content.content:
2 - Poet Roy Campbell is born.
6 - Actor Bernard Rebel is born.

content.title: November
content.content: 11 - Dorothy Whitelock, later colleague of Tolkien, is born.

? - The Tolkiens move from Moseley to a small villa behind King's Heath Station.
